data.title: Ideas and Advice for Leaders
data.meta_description: Find new ideas and classic advice on strategy, innovation and leadership, for global leaders from the world's best business and management experts.
data.text:
3 Ways to Clearly Communicate Your Company’s Strategy

Most leaders struggle to explain big decisions in a way that makes sense to employees. What can they do to help employees understand enough context to understand a strategy?

Corporate Advocacy in a Time of Social Outrage

Employees expect employers to speak out on social, political, and environmental issues. Businesses can’t weigh in every time, but they can create a culture of open dialogue and ethical transparency.
